description: A spacious and quiet room atop a private home in Bedford Stuyvesant. This space is my sanctuary away from the noise of the city. Simple, minimal, and modest. Furnished with a wardrobe, twin bed, a desk, and a floor cushion for quiet reflection. There is an empty room across from this one so the entire apartment will be yours for your stay
name: Cozy Bed Stuy Sanctuary
review: Very cozy place. Quintessential Brooklyn place. I loved it.
